Title: A Rough Draft
Writer: Maksim Budarin, Denis Kuryshev, Sergey Lukyanenko (novel), Sergey Mokritskiy, Olga Sobenina
Actors: Nikita Volkov, Severija Janusauskaite, Vilen Babichev, Olga Borovskaya
Plot: A video game designer is stripped of his identity and recruited by a mysterious force to be the gatekeeper of a multi-dimensional portal.
